body.name: Rubber Broom with Squeegee and Adjustable Long Handle, Pet Hair and Fur Remover, Portable Detailing Lint Remover Brush, Carpet Rake and Floor Brush for Hardwood, Tile and Window

features: 【New Design Rubber Broom】The brush head is made of rubber bristles, a durable material which is not easy to get deformed, they can attract and remove pet hair on multiple surfaces easily, like carpet ,tile, hardwood floor and linoleum. Innovative design makes cleaning up pet hair and dirt easy and fast without scratching your floors. More efficient than normal broom, dust or hair won't fly all around while cleaning.

【Built-in Squeegee】This rubber brush has a built-in squeegee, works great to wipe away liquid spills on tile,concrete,or any hardwood surface such as patio decks or interior flooring. The built-in squeegee for cleaning window or spill,saving you the hassle of additional drying using towel or mop

【Adjustable Stainless Steel Handle】The rubber broom with long handle consists of three Stainless Steel poles, which can be adjusted from 20 inches to 48 inches in length according to needs. Long enough size can clean any hard to reach place. No need to bend over in low place or use ladders at high places

【Pet Brush Combo】Handheld rubber brush for easy removal of hair from clothing, car seats and crevices. The rubber bristles are designed to be gentle enough and can also be used on your pet's face to remove debris or work tangles out.

【Easy to Clean】Dust or hair is easily washed off from the soft rubber bristles and looks like new, with excellent water resistance and fast drying. Non scratch rubber bristle broom requires little maintenance and last for years using
body.description: SWETHAW PET HAIR REMOVER BROOM/BRUSH WITH SQUEEGEE Pet owner's best household cleaning tool It is disgusting that hair or pet hair appears anywhere in your house. Especially if you have pets, you must own this rubber broom hair removal. It makes sweeping up pet hair a breeze. The soft head is made of natural rubber that acts like a pet hair magnet and won’t scratch hardwood floors. Thanks to the adjustable handle, the broom can be adjusted directly to your height and your back is protected. The household broom is equally suitable for removing dry and damp dirt. With a squeegee edge, the rubber broom can easily clean various floors, furniture, and glass shower doors. But wait, there’s more! This rubber broom also comes with a portable detailing lint remover brush that can easily clean loose hair and remove fluff from car seats, floors and cushions. The rubber bristles are designed to be gentle enough and can also be used on your pet’s face to remove debris or work tangles out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SWETHAW PET HAIR REMOVER BROOM/BRUSH WITH SQUEEGEE Pet owner's best household cleaning tool It is disgusting that hair or pet hair appears anywhere in your house. Especially if you have pets, you must own this rubber broom hair removal. It makes sweeping up pet hair a breeze. The soft head is made of natural rubber that acts like a pet hair magnet and won’t scratch hardwood floors. Thanks to the adjustable handle, the broom can be adjusted directly to your height and your back is protected. The household broom is equally suitable for removing dry and damp dirt. With a squeegee edge, the rubber broom can easily clean various floors, furniture, and glass shower doors. But wait, there’s more! This rubber broom also comes with a portable detailing lint remover brush that can easily clean loose hair and remove fluff from car seats, floors and cushions. The rubber bristles are designed to be gentle enough and can also be used on your pet’s face to remove debris or work tangles out. Specification: Brand: SWETHAW Broom Length: 61.4 in Broom Head Size: 12.6 in Broom Weight: 1.25 lb Brush Size: 9.8in x 2.4in Brush Weight: 0.2 lb Color: White+Grey Material: Stainless Steel+Plastic+Rubber

Portable Detailing Lint Remover Brush The portable detailing lint remover brush that can easily remove lint, fluff and hair from your couch, furniture, car seats and clothes. No more sitting down to find yourself covered in cat or dog hair. Simply brush the area with this brush, keeping it flat to the surface and applying even pressure. The rubber bristles flex so they won’t damage the surface. The rubber hand brush also features a built-in squeegee blade. It is ideal for cleaning glass, mirrors and shower screens etc.

Hair Removal For carpet hair removal, pull the broom in short, sharp strokes to bring embedded hair to the surface of the carpet. Even expensive vacuums made specifically for pet hair can't compete with the hair removal Broom's ability to pick up embedded pet hair. Water Removal Water on the floor and bathroom can be easily removed. It can also be used as a window scraper The natural rubber of the squeegee blade prevents water spots even on glass, which is great for wiping windows, glass shower doors, and car windshields. Dust Removal Will provide you with cleaner floors than ever with less time and less effort. 50% more efficient than ordinary broom, dust or hair won't fly all over while sweeping. Soft natural rubber bristles are suitable for cleaning any fragile surface in the home, they will never scratch furniture.

By washing under the tap, dust or hair is easily washed off the bristles,hair will never stick to the rubber bristles. keeping the broom clean and looking like new. Water-resistant and quick-drying performance is really amazing! Premium rubber Bristles will stay in shape like new even after long-time use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for a salon
reviews.reviewText: I really love this broom. I got it for my studio salon and nothing has ever been so effective at sweeping up hair. Hair also won't stick to it. Its like using a new broom every time.The handle is a little too long and my hair gets caught in it. I need to readjust to a smaller size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Problem Dog Hair Solved
reviews.reviewText: Great to get dog hair off on floors, carpet and hardwood, furniture and cars. It's especially good on car upholstery for short dog hair that get stuck! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Grabs hair from carpet easily!
reviews.reviewText: I looked at getting a pet hair broom, but for human hair. Two of us in the house have long hair that sheds like crazy, and I normally spend 20 minutes each vacuum time cutting the hair from the roller. It was crazy! So I bought this after reading the reviews.It works really well. I have noticed that on my shag carpet, I need to hold the broom more upright (where the bristles are a little flatter against the carpet...) And the squeegee side works amazingly well on my carpet too! I picked up so much hair! And my vacuum didn't need surgery afterwards...My only criticism (which took off a ⭐) is that the pole is not the best. It's sturdy, yet flimsy if that makes sense. The metal pole seems like it would hold up quite well, but it is attached together with plastic rungs, which do not seem sturdy at all. I am tightening them repeatedly during use and I feel like those sections are going to snap during use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for daily use
reviews.reviewText: I may never need a swiffer again. It is perfect for my area rugs. It reaches under my furniture. It’s fast and easy to use. It finds fuzz that I didn’t know it existed. My next purchase will be for the small handheld so that I can use it on my furniture.My personal recommendation for use is to quickly brush over all of the floors before running the robotic vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm an old woman with a lot of health problems and don't get around to vacuuming like I should so my long hair gathers on the carpet. This tool picks up the hair like a charm and cleans right up. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This particular rubber broom is garbage. I own another one that works great. This one doesn't work at all. It's flimsy. If I dare to press harder, the handle bends. It's super short too. Yet claims no bending over. I'm petite too so I'm unsure how an average or tall person could fare with this rubbish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect back saver for cleaning pet beds!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a short handled silicone brush for the dog beds. It was killing my back. Vacuums just don't get all the dogs hair of the beds.I saw this long handled version and had to try. Assembly was easy. Seems extremely sturdy. Did not bend at all when using hard on the dog beds.. Amazing, I could sweep standing up, not bent over! This broom pulls every single hair out of the canvas cover. I make a pile and then just sweep with another new broom I purchased at the same time.This silicone broom is the regular width. It rinses clean. I am guessing that the squeegee side may make washing screens and windows easier.This broom saves a great deal of time prior to using a vacuum on area rugs. It removes almost all the dog hair so the vacuum can do the hard work, getting the deep dirt out. No full cannister needing dumped just because of dog hair and losing suction because the hair is loading up the vacuum!Yes, if you have animals that shed, perfect. The scrubbing option is something I need to do to review how it works. I am guessing it will be perfect for my tiled screened in porches since it washes up so well, just guessing that I won't have to get 1 for indoor and 1 for outdoor. Have hopes I only need one. Only because it rinses and is exceptionally clean after a spray cleaner and water. Trying this 1st. Will try to revisit this review if it doesn't work. If you don't see an additional comment after this, assume that it works well.
This broom is great! P but the handle is unusually short
